item.title: 瑞典核心通胀率意外跃升至八个月高点
item.description: 瑞典上个月的核心通胀率加速超过预期，可能会抑制市场对瑞典央行进一步降息的预期。【原文：Sweden’s core inflation accelerated more than expected last month, potentially dampening expectations in the market about further interest-rate cuts by the Riksbank.】

item.title: 德国订单激增，进一步表明工业趋于稳定
item.description: 德国 12 月份的工厂订单激增，这进一步证明了陷入困境的制造业前景可能正在改善。【原文：German factory orders surged in December, adding to evidence that the outlook for the beleaguered sector may be improving.】

item.title: 英国央行的流动性流失终于再次提升了关键的 SONIA 利率
item.description: 英国最重要的市场利率近一年来首次上升，反映出英格兰银行正在努力从金融体系中抽走过剩的流动性。【原文：The UK’s most important market interest rate is rising for the first time in almost a year, reflecting the Bank of England’s ongoing efforts to drain excess liquidity from the financial system.】

item.title: 斗山在捷克罕见的首次公开募股中以中等价格出售单位股份
item.description: Doosan Enerbility Co.通过首次公开募股出售了其捷克蒸汽轮机部门的股份，定价在目标范围的中间，成为四年多来布拉格最大的新上市公司。【原文：Doosan Enerbility Co. sold a stake in its Czech steam-turbine unit through an initial public offering that was priced at the middle of the target range, becoming the biggest new listing in Prague in more than four years.】

item.title: 保乐力加因中国干邑市场下滑而下调销售预期
item.description: 保乐力加集团（Pernod Ricard SA）下调了今年的销售预期，称中国经济放缓拖累了对马爹利干邑（Martell Cognac）的需求。【原文：Pernod Ricard SA has cut its sales outlook for the year, saying China’s slowdown was weighing on demand for its Martell Cognac.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：预期英国央行降息前英国股市将反弹
钨矿商称客户对中国掐断供应难以置信
item.description: 在中国对钨实施出口管制后，刘易斯-布莱克（Lewis Black）的电话一直响个不停，钨是他的公司开采的一种利基金属，对武器制造至关重要。【原文：The phone has been ringing off the hook for Lewis Black after China imposed export controls on tungsten, a niche metal mined by his firm that’s crucial to weapons manufacturing.】

item.title: 马来西亚称美国关税对芯片制造商影响甚微
item.description: 贸易部长扎弗鲁尔-阿齐兹（Zafrul Aziz）表示，美国对一些国家征收的新关税对马来西亚半导体产业的影响微乎其微。【原文：New tariffs by the US on some countries will have a minimal impact on Malaysia’s semiconductor industry, according to Trade Minister Zafrul Aziz.】

item.title: 法国兴业银行宣布向投资者支付 17 亿欧元，利润超预期
item.description: 法国兴业银行（Societe Generale SA）宣布去年向投资者派发 17 亿欧元（18 亿美元），因为法国零售银行业的复苏带动第四季度利润超出预期。【原文：Societe Generale SA announced a €1.7 billion ($1.8 billion) investor payout for last year, as fourth-quarter profit beat expectations driven by a recovery in French retail banking.】

item.title: 黑格塞斯与菲律宾讨论南海 "威慑 "问题
item.description: 面对南海地缘政治的紧张局势，美国国防部长皮特-黑格塞斯（Pete Hegseth）在马尼拉与菲律宾国防部长通电话时重申了华盛顿与菲律宾签订共同防御条约的 "坚定 "承诺。【原文：US Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth reaffirmed Washington’s “ironclad” commitment to a mutual defense treaty with the Philippines during a call with his counterpart in Manila in the face of geopolitical tensions in South China Sea.】

item.title: 贝森特解读特朗普。这不会是最后一次
item.description:
至少，他们在10年期收益率上的经济策略 让人们不再关注美联储。【原文：

At least their economic strategy on the 10-year yield takes the focus off the Fed.

】

item.title: 泰国在长期拖延后重启央行行长遴选
item.description: 泰国重启了拖延数月的中央银行新主席遴选程序，此前曾试图任命一位前部长担任这一职务，但因其政治背景而未能如愿。【原文：Thailand has restarted a process delayed for several months to select a new chairman for the nation’s central bank after a previous attempt to appoint a former minister to the post failed due to his political links.】

item.title: 特朗普的关税威胁为何让英国头疼不已？
item.description:
在本期《在都市》节目中，我们将探讨共和党的不可预测性如何成为首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）的难题。【原文：

On this episode of In the City, we look at how the Republican’s unpredictability is a problem for Prime Minister Keir Starmer.

】

item.title: 欧洲央行即将公布降息幅度的重大线索
item.description: 欧洲中央银行即将在有关欧元区利率走向的辩论中抛出一个关键信息。【原文：The European Central Bank is about to throw a crucial piece of information into the debate over where euro-zone interest rates are headed.】

item.title: 捷克央行行长的比特币言论引发关注
item.description: 捷克央行行长将部分国家储备投资于比特币的举措，比他的任何前任都更能引起人们对这个中欧国家货币政策的关注。【原文：The Czech central bank governor’s bid to invest a portion of the country’s reserves into Bitcoin managed to draw more attention to the central European nation’s monetary policy than any of his predecessors.】

item.title: 数千人排队显示南非就业危机令人绝望
item.description: Maleshwane Lethaba 和其他成千上万的南非年轻人一样，排着长长的队伍，连起点都看不见。【原文：In a queue that stretched so far the start was out of sight, Maleshwane Lethaba joined thousands of other young South Africans waiting desperately for a chance of work.】

item.title: 法国总理通过了预算案，但尚不清楚他能否做得更多
item.description: 周一，法国总理弗朗索瓦-巴伊鲁（Francois Bayrou）迫使法国分裂的议会通过了预算案，并成功避免了极左派推翻其政府的企图。但他的连胜可能就此结束。【原文：Prime Minister Francois Bayrou’s forced a budget through France’s divided parliament on Monday and succeeded in avoiding a far-left attempt to topple his government. But his winning streak may end there.】

item.title: 卡莱尔旗下 Hexaware 在印度首次公开募股中寻求高达 10 亿美元的资金
item.description: 信息技术服务提供商 Hexaware Technologies Ltd. 将于下周开始接受首次股票销售订单，这是印度今年首次以十亿美元的价格上市。【原文：Information technology services provider Hexaware Technologies Ltd. will start taking orders for its initial share sale next week in India’s first billion-dollar listing this year.】

item.title: 野村称美国取缔贸易漏洞将抑制中国经济增长
item.description: 据野村控股公司（Nomura Holdings Inc.【原文：The decision by President Donald Trump to ban Chinese companies from using a US tariff loophole will hit tens of billions of dollars of trade and reduce China’s economic growth this year, according to new estimates by economists at Nomura Holdings Inc.】

item.title: 据说贝恩接近以 30 亿美元收购三菱制药部门
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，贝恩资本（Bain Capital）即将达成收购三菱化学集团制药部门的交易，为日本的交易热潮再添一笔。【原文：Bain Capital is nearing a deal to buy Mitsubishi Chemical Group Corp.’s pharmaceutical unit, people familiar with the matter said, adding to a dealmaking boom in Japan.】

item.title: 新加坡对芯片和人工智能的投资承诺增至 100 亿美元
item.description: 尽管商业环境严峻，但受半导体、航空航天和人工智能等行业承诺投资的推动，去年对新加坡的投资从2023年的127亿新元（100亿美元）增至135亿新元（100亿美元）。【原文：Investments into Singapore last year rose to S$13.5 billion ($10 billion) from S$12.7 billion in 2023, driven by pledges from sectors including semiconductors, aerospace and artificial intelligence despite a tough business environment.】

item.title: 私人信贷机构通过破产接管 Zips 洗车场
item.description: 洗车场运营商 Zips Car Wash 已申请破产，计划将企业控制权移交给私人信用贷款人。【原文：Car wash operator Zips Car Wash has filed for bankruptcy with a plan to hand over control of the business to its private credit lenders.】

item.title: OpenAI 联合创始人约翰-舒尔曼离开竞争对手 Anthropic 公司
item.description: 约翰-舒尔曼（John Schulman）是著名的人工智能研究员，也是 OpenAI 的创始人之一，他已经离开了竞争对手 Anthropic 公司。【原文：John Schulman, a prominent artificial intelligence researcher who co-founded OpenAI, has left rival firm Anthropic, a job he held since the summer.】

item.title: 印度消费基金在预算案税收优惠后重回聚光灯下
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 中国炼油企业将在关税风暴后转售美国石油货物
item.description: 在中国政府回应华盛顿关税之后，中国的国营炼油厂预计将转售美国石油货物并寻求替代供应，此举已经推高了一些替代等级石油的成本。【原文：China’s state-run refiners are expected to resell US oil cargoes and seek alternative supplies in the aftermath of Beijing’s response to Washington tariffs, a move that is already pushing up the cost of some replacement grades.】

item.title: 贝森特表示期待与日本央行上田密切合作
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）在与日本央行行长上田一夫（Kazuo Ueda）进行了虚拟介绍性通话后发表讲话称，美国财政部长期待与上田一夫开展密切而富有成效的合作。【原文：US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent is looking forward to working closely and productively with Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda, according to a Treasury readout after the two held a virtual introductory call.】

item.title: 前澳大利亚央行经济学家称全球贸易冲击使狭窄道路更加复杂
item.description: 一位前央行经济学家表示，澳大利亚疲弱的经济扩张和顽固的强劲通胀，再加上国际贸易的不确定性，可能会对储备银行实现软着陆的努力构成挑战。【原文：Australia’s weak economic expansion and stubbornly strong inflation, together with uncertainty over international trade, may challenge the Reserve Bank’s efforts to engineer a soft landing, according to a former central bank economist.】

item.title: 墨西哥参议院批准夸德拉担任墨西哥银行副行长
item.description: 墨西哥参议院周三批准何塞-加布里埃尔-夸德拉-加西亚（Jose Gabriel Cuadra Garcia）进入央行五人董事会，这距离今年首次货币政策决策只有几个小时的时间。【原文：Mexico’s Senate approved Jose Gabriel Cuadra Garcia to the central bank’s five-member board on Wednesday, just hours before the first monetary policy decision of the year.】

item.title: 日本央行田村称下半年利率应至少为 1
item.description: 日本央行最鹰派的董事会成员田村直树（Naoki Tamura）表示，从 4 月份开始的下一个财政年度可能会有两次或更多次加息，以控制实现央行稳定通胀目标的上行风险。【原文：The Bank of Japan’s most hawkish board member Naoki Tamura indicated there could be two or more interest rate hikes in the upcoming fiscal year starting in April, in order to contain upside risks for achieving the central bank’s stable inflation target.】

item.title: 普拉博沃打出民粹牌，为印尼疲软的经济增长注入活力
item.description: 印尼总统普拉博沃-苏比安托（Prabowo Subianto）在上任的头几个月里采取了一系列民粹主义措施，以刺激东南亚最大经济体的消费者，这是他将经济增长提高到近三十年来从未见过的水平的目标之一。【原文：Indonesian President Prabowo Subianto is banking on a raft of populist measures in his first months in office to energize consumers in Southeast Asia’s largest economy, part of his goals to boost growth to levels not seen in nearly three decades.】
